thread.title: U.S. still assessing intel on Syria chemical attack: Mattis

title: U.S. still assessing intel on Syria chemical attack: Mattis
text:
U.S. still assessing intel on Syria chemical attack: Mattis   00:32 
The United States is still assessing intelligence about last weekend's suspected chemical weapons attack in Syria, U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said on Wednesday, striking a cautious tone hours after President Donald Trump threatened missile strikes. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
